org.semanticweb.yars.nx

Class Literal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.semanticweb.yars.nx.Literal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable, Node

    public class Literal
extends java.lang.Object
implements Node, java.io.Serializable
    An RDF literal of any data type Need to do newline escaping for (string) literals otherwise it's not valid RDF any more.
    Author:
    Andreas Harth, Tobias Kaefer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
